code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{CarritoContext}from"../context/CarritoContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Carrito=()=>{const{carrito,setCarrito}=useContext(CarritoContext);const eliminarDelCarrito=id=>{const nuevoCarrito=carrito.filter(item=>item._id!==id);setCarrito(nuevoCarrito);};const total=carrito.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+item.precio*item.cantidad,0);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contenedor-carrito",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDED2 Tu carrito de compras"}),carrito.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uD83E\uDDFA El carrito est\xE1 vac\xEDo. \xA1Agrega productos para comenzar!"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"lista-carrito",children:[carrito.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-carrito",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.imagenUrl||"/imagenes/default.jpg",alt:item.nombre,onError:e=>e.target.src="/imagenes/default.jpg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"info-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:item.nombre}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Cantidad: ",item.cantidad]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Precio:"," ",new Intl.NumberFormat("es-CO",{style:"currency",currency:"COP",minimumFractionDigits:0}).format(item.precio)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>eliminarDelCarrito(item._id),children:"\u274C Eliminar"})]})]},item._id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"total-carrito",children:["Total:"," ",new Intl.NumberFormat("es-CO",{style:"currency",currency:"COP",minimumFractionDigits:0}).format(total)]})]})]});};export default Carrito;
